extension_name.description: Extension name shown in the Chrome Web Store and UI.

extension_description.description: Extension description for manifest and store listing.
extension_description.message: An AI-powered assistant to help create Anki cards from dictionary lookup results.

ai_service_error_request_failed.description: Network or HTTP error while calling the provider.

ai_service_error_request_with_message.description: Aggregated error message when all provider attempts fail.

ai_service_error_unknown_provider.description: Thrown when the provider id is not recognized.

ai_service_prompt_classic.description: Default instructions for classic AI parsing.
ai_service_prompt_classic.message:
Convert the following dictionary lookup result into structured data for an Anki card.
Return a pure JSON object that only includes the "front" and "back" fields. Do not add extra commentary or code fences.
JSON example:
{
  "front": "Word",
  "back": "Complete lookup result with original formatting"
}

Source text:
---
$INPUT$
---

INPUT.description: Source text that should be parsed

prompt_engine_custom_template_header.description: Header for dynamic Prompt template generation.
prompt_engine_custom_template_header.message:
$TEMPLATE$
-------------------------------
Here is the input for this session: $INPUT$

prompt_engine_default_header.message:
# Role: Professional Word Lookup Assistant

Please complete the following tasks:
1. Look up the word/phrase: "{{INPUT_TEXT}}"
2. Generate detailed analysis information
3. Output in the following JSON format:
{{FIELD_SCHEMA}}

Requirements:
- Output in pure JSON format, without any explanatory text
- Fill in the corresponding fields based on the characteristics of the word/phrase
- If a field is not applicable, you can omit it

prompt_engine_error_json_parse.description: Error message for failing to parse the Prompt generation result JSON.

prompt_engine_schema_word.description: Schema hint: indicates the word itself

prompt_engine_requirements_body.message:
Requirements:
- Output in valid JSON format
- Only use fields: $FIELDS$
- Each field value MUST be a plain text string, do NOT use nested objects or arrays
- Partial output is acceptable, but field names must be accurate

options_ui_floating_assistant_descriptio.message: When you select text on a web page, a floating button will automatically appear. Click it to quickly parse and create Anki cards. You can disable this feature if you encounter compatibility issues.

template_card_fields_count.description: Unit for the number of fields displayed on the template card.

template_card_default_badge.description: Default badge on the template card.

template_card_updated_at.description: Updated time label on the template card.

template_card_delete_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this template? This action cannot be undone.

options_toast_template_set_default.description: Success message for setting default template.

options_toast_template_set_default_error.description: Error message for setting default template.

options_toast_template_edit_error.description: Error message for loading template for edit.
options_toast_template_edit_error.message: Failed to load template for editing

template_form_validation_failed.message: Form validation failed, please check your input
